Mha (Jia et al. 2019). Recent regional assessments not included in the SRCCL found up to 69 Mha in

using bioenergy depend on: (i) change in GHG emissions when bioenergy substitutes another energy
source; and (ii) how the associated la
nd use and possible land use change influence the amount of carbon
